description: This file defines the external API for the Udp Ping Server Object as part of the Advanced Networking Service Container (ANSC). It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the server object, intended to be implemented elsewhere.

methods.name: AnscUpsoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Udp Ping Server Object with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: AnscUpsoRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the Udp Ping Server Object instance.

methods.name: AnscUpsoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers necessary sub-objects or components within the server object.

methods.name: AnscUpsoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Udp Ping Server Object, setting up necessary state.
